name: Dragging Dungeons
description:
• Follow the recently beheaded Evelin, heir to the royal throne, after she re-awakens in a muddy dungeon.
  • Click & drag to combine objects and carve a new empire from the bowels of the earth.
  • Grow and harvest plants, smelt and craft new materials, fish for Eldridge crustaceans, interact with peculiar monsters, and much more.
